## Proposed hypothesis

Is there a correlation between volume of threatening events and local temperature in the US?

## How data can be collected

1.  Download data from GDELT based on event code and country for the past 5 years

2.  Download historical temperature reading for all US states in the past 5 years

## What methods could be considered?

1.  Linear regression
2.  K-nearest
